name: Packagist.alfredworkflow
tagline: Alfred 2 workflow for searching Packagist for Composer packages.
body:
# Alfred 2 workflow for Packagist
**[Download!](https://github.com/skyzyx/packagist.alfredworkflow/raw/master/packagist.alfredworkflow)** Requires [Alfred 2 and the Powerpack](http://www.alfredapp.com/powerpack/). Updates can be found and installed using **[Monkey Patch](http://j.mp/monkey-patch)**, or the older [Alleyoop](http://alfred.daniel.sh/Workflows/Alleyoop.alfredworkflow) (discontinued).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
